snippet: Ms. Sachs produced a portfolio of complementary suits, jackets, shirts and skirts that worked with women’s need for professional clothes for the office.
abstract: Gloria Sachs, fashion designer for career women, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Sachs produced a portfolio of complementary suits, jackets, shirts and skirts that worked with women’s need for professional clothes for the office.

headline.seo: Gloria Sachs, Fashion Designer for Working Women, Dies at 85
